醳字的基本解释

醳
yì
酒；醇酒：“觞醳泛波。”
赏赐酒食：“百里之内，牛酒日至，以饗士大夫，醳兵。”

醳
shì
古通“释”，释放：“共执张仪，掠笞数百，不服，醳之。”

醳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》羊益切，入昔，以。］
(1)新酿成的酒。
(2)醇酒。
(3)赏赐酒食。参见“醳兵”。
[②]［shì］
［《集韻》施隻切，入昔，書。］
通“釋1”。
释放；舍去。

醳字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醳； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1288第09
【廣韻】羊益切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】夷益切，?音睪。【廣韻】苦酒。【集韻】一曰醇酒也。【周禮·天官·酒正·一曰事酒註】事酒，今之醳酒也。【疏】事酒，冬釀春成，以漢之醳酒况之。【左思·魏都賦】有醳順時。　又【史記·淮隂侯傳】百里之內，牛酒日至，以饗士大夫、醳兵。【註】謂以酒食養兵士。　又或作澤。【禮·郊特牲·舊澤之酒也註】澤，讀爲醳。舊醳之酒，謂昔酒也。　又【集韻】思積切，音昔。義同。　又【集韻】施隻切，音釋。淸也。　又古文釋字。【戰國策】王欲醳臣專任所善，則臣請歸醳事。【史記·張儀傳】共執張儀，掠笞數百，不服，醳之。【註】索隱曰：醳，古釋字。

醳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醳字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
yì
Liquor; mellow wine: "Faithful."
Reward for wine and food: "Within a hundred miles, the day of the cattle and wine will come, to the scholar-officials and the soldiers."
Glutinous rice
shì
Gu Tong "released" and released: "Together, hold Zhang Yi, plunder hundreds of people, and refuse to accept it."
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yang Yi cut, into the past, to. ]
(1) Newly brewed wine.
(2) Alcoholic wine.
(3) Reward wine and food. See "Li Bing".
[②]［shì］
["Ji Yun" Shi only cuts into the past, book. ]
Through "Release 1".
Release; discard.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醳; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1288 Page 09
[Guang Yun] Sheep Yi Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yi Yi cut,? Yin Sui. [Guang Yun] bitter wine. [Jiyun] Firstly, it's mellow wine. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Jiuzheng·Yiyue Shijiu Note】 Shijiu is also the wine of today. [Sparse] The wine is brewed in winter and matured in spring, based on the condition of Han wine. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] There is a good time.　 [Historical Records · Huaiyin Hou Biography] Within a hundred li, the day of the cattle and wine is coming, with the scholars and the soldiers. [Note] It means to raise soldiers with wine and food.　Or Zuo Ze. [Li, Jiao Special Sacrifice, Jiuze Wine Also Note] Ze, pronounced as 醳. The old wine is also called the old wine.　[Jiyun] Thinking and cutting, sound Xi. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Shi Zhiqie, sound interpretation. Yeah.　Ancient interpretation of words. [Warring States Policy] If Wang wants to be a minister, he will take full charge of what is good, and the ministers please return to the matter. [Historical Records·The Biography of Zhang Yi] A total of Zhang Yi was in charge, and hundreds of them were plundered, but they were not convinced. [Note] Suo Yin said: 醳, the ancient interpretation of the word.

*крепкое (выдержанное) вино
肴醳закуски и вино, угощение
